column5: Enjoy the spectacular canyon views and rollings hills. This property is on its own cul-de-sac without any distractions. Fully Furnished and stocked. Deer cut through the backyard in the morning, and the sounds of coyotes can be heard in the hills at night. Close to I-10W into the Hill Country, Boerne or into San Antonio and the luxury shops/dining of La Cantera and Six Flags Fiesta Texas.
